metadata.title: CVE-2022-41727 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker can craft a malformed TIFF image which will consume asignificant amount of memory when passed to DecodeConfig. This could leadto a denial of service.

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-image: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
